page.title: 09Retirement in Breamore
page.content: I retired to Breamore about four years ago.I feel very fortunate in my first experience of English village life.Most of my working life has been spent in cities, both in England and abroad.In a way, living here is like stepping back into the past,for the house and streets have changed little since the first Elizabeth' time. .Perhaps this is a good thing, though I'm sure the recent modernization of some estate houses has been welcomed! My day begins early,with prayer. I then anxiously survey the havoc wrecked downstairs by our new puppy.I am hoping the obedience classes we attend will make all our lives less chaotic.Mornings are reserved for paperwork,afternoons for getting out and seeing people, my greatest pleasure.Gardening and visiting the New Forest are my other indulgences.
